index.html.value: This was the second phase in bringing together the whole Nike brand into one single experience, this part included the whole shopping experience and also the gender landing pages. The goal was to create a fast, easy to use shopping fully integrated with Nike's brand storytelling. The project took nearly two years (I was on it for the last 10 months). The site is designed to fit into 32 languages in 50 countries. I worked all over the designs, but where I most of all made an impact was on the design of gridwalls, cart, checkout, product detail pages, navigations, landing pages (gift cards and kids), mylocker, order/return pages, profile settings, help pages, iconography and form fields.t Creative Direction: Mark Laughlin, Fura Johannesdottir. Art Direction: Hoshi Ludwig Senior Visual Design: Matt Schreiber, Augusto Paiva Visual Design: Erik Herrström, Rumiana Williams. Interaction Direction: Xavier Gallego Interaction Design: Caitlin Robinson, Rahul Sen, Jiaxin Feng, Evinn Quinn, Rachel Inman, Christine Horvat, Greg Siegal. Production: Mark Norris, Elizabeth Bell, Emily Fare, Dina Mansour, Wes Adams

This was the second phase in bringing together the whole Nike brand into one single experience, this part included the whole shopping experience and also the gender landing pages. The goal was to create a fast, easy to use shopping fully integrated with Nike's brand storytelling. The project took nearly two years (I was on it for the last 10 months). The site is designed to fit into 32 languages in 50 countries. I worked all over the designs, but where I most of all made an impact was on the design of gridwalls, cart, checkout, product detail pages, navigations, landing pages (gift cards and kids), mylocker, order/return pages, profile settings, help pages, iconography and form fields.t Creative Direction: Mark Laughlin, Fura Johannesdottir. This was the second phase in bringing together the whole Nike brand into one single experience, this part included the whole shopping experience and also the gender landing pages. about.html.value: I'm a 25 year old self-taught Swedish Visual Designer, currently in New York at R/GA. I recently graduated from the Digital Media program at Hyper Island.

R/GA
Period: November 2011 - Present
Role: Visual Design Intern

Hyper Island
Karlskrona
Period: August 2010 - June 2012
Program: Digital Media

MrCurrent AB
Period: June 2004 - Present
Role: Freelance designer

Svenska Spel
Visby
Period: June 2008 - September 2009
Role: Designer

“Erik is an excellent designer and I am very satisfied with the results from his work for our website. Erik has a great capacity, is very efficient and understand his clients' requirements perfectly. I highly recommend him.” Isabelle Sjövall, Creative Director, Stargo

"[...] Summing-up Erik is already today remarkably high competent in the field of design, both when it comes to form language and underlying technical knowledge. To this must be added his open mind versus new knowledge and new ideas, his ability to learn quickly and his way not only to function in a group but also to contribute with new energy.

If Svenska Spel had the opportunity we would employ Erik without hesitation. We can’t but congratulate the company who will take advantage of Erik’s work." Jerker Nilsson, Head of Digital Production, Svenska Spel

Full testimonial is available upon request.

“Erik is a highly enthusiastic guy who really knows his stuff. He works hard and have great knowledge within web design. He is loyal and strive to come close to perfection no matter what the task is. I would love to recommend him to any given employer.” Marcus Hultin, Project Manager Sportbetting, Svenska Spel

“Erik is a very talented and creative designer whom I worked with at Svenska Spel. Erik has a very creative mind and always completes his projects on time. I would recommend anyone hiring or working with Erik at anytime.” Andreas Ahlenius, Search and Affiliate Manager, Svenska Spel
